A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Oh Disney\, what have you done. There are so many inconsistencies in the story\, the whole story does not really move forward\, so many stupid story choices. Most characters do not develop\, bad story arc. The childish humour does not fit at all. Most new creatures simply are not Star Wars. \n\nBottom line: some nice scenes\, but in general a good example of bad storytelling. Disney Popcorn Cinema\, but lacks any grandeur a Star Wars film lives of.
